name: MIS PIU Incidents for a Prisoner
description:
Displays Incident data for a single prisoner.

POL0004 â€“ v00.00.01 Last Modified: 05/11/13

dataset.name: Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Incident Details
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TEXT, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TITLE, AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, DAY_DATE, INCIDENT_TEXT, INCIDENT_TITLE, PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_PARTICIPANTS.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS VLINKEDNOMSNUMBERS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Incident Participants
dataset.query: DP4_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TEXT, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TITLE, AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = (SELECT PRISONER_NUMBER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter NOMS Number','A',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION, undefined_ WHERE ((AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIP_ROLE.INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR AT_INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999'))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID IN (SELECT INCIDENT_CASE_ID FROM DP4_) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP')) AND (undefined)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, PARTICIPATION_ROLE_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, INCIDENT_PARTICIPANTS.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS VLINKEDNOMSNUMBERS FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: Report Variant 141890.RS does not have corresponding dataset undefined
